content: Look to the left of that statue altar, and you’ll find a small field around the back with a concerning amount of skeletons, and a well. Using the Rattle-Drum here one final time will cause the spirit of the boy to appear before you, and invite you to hop down the well to meet a “friend”.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windseal Gate'.
The content is as follows:
Look to the left of that statue altar, and you’ll find a small field around the back with a concerning amount of skeletons, and a well. Using the Rattle-Drum here one final time will cause the spirit of the boy to appear before you, and invite you to hop down the well to meet a “friend”.
